comment: The work is easy but all of it can be done at home. In class participation is pointless and she never talked about anything useful when lecturing, instead goes on rants about her childhood that no one cares about.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Great lady and teacher. Highly recommended

DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS!!!!!!!!!! She makes this class stressful for no reason, not an easy A must work for it. Group project is stressful must meet with group out of class which many people will have conflicting schedules. Tardies count as absents once you reach a certain amount. PLEASE AVIOD THIS CLASS FIND ANOTHER TEACHER!!!

This class was unnecessarily stressful! Wish I would have gone on here and read the other comments so I would have saved myself the trouble. The worst part is having to make time out of class to meet up for a month long group project.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--EXTRA CREDIT--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: She makes you work for the A, but if you put the work in, you will do well. Midterm is a game of Jeopardy, and the Final is a scavenger hunt.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: GO TO CLASS. She seems like a hard ass and you will want to drop it the first week but she's actually the most easy going person as long as you go to class. Midterm is a jeopardy game and final is a scavenger hunt. Always do the Bearface assignments. GO TO CLASS!!!!!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring--Would take again

comment: Coach Kelso uses an online platform which basically turns her class into a hybrid when it actually isn't supposed to be. She is very passionate about her job and health among young people, but the way that she teaches with the online platform is almost way too much for a basic class just to graduate. The whole semester is a group project.
Tough grader but is easy going and laid back for the most part.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: You have to take everything she says with a grain of salt. She teaches like the middle school teacher she is, but if you look past that, you'll find it somewhat enjoyable every now and then. One problem is consistency. I was barked at one day for taking notes in her class, then other days she yells at everyone for not taking notes.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Yeah, she may take her class too serious, but as a person she is amazing. She will say you have test but we didn't have a single one in her class. Mid-term was taken but grades were not counted against you. The final is a scavenger hunt so if you show up, you get a 100. If you skip you will more than likely fail.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Inspirational

comment: Way to much work for a P.E class. Be ready to write a full paper on the smallest things. She will NEVER cancel class, there have numerous occasions where we came to class for less than 5 minutes just to get a worksheet or her tell us some kind of update where a emailed would have been so easy. You can only miss 1 class after that you lost 5 points.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: She takes her class way too seriously. Its a college level P.E. class and all of the work is online. Coming to class seems pointless but you lose 5 points for each absence after your first.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Very rude and disrespectful and treats her class like a middle school class. You aren't allowed to wear hats, use your cellphone, or computers. Each class you miss (besides 1) she takes five points off your FINAL grade, and two tardies gets you five points off your final grade as well.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: DONE TAKE HER. She makes a simple class harder than what it should be, grades really hard, and is very rude.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: She is very knowladgeable when it comes to what she teaches, but is extremely rude, a very tough grader, and unforgiving. No hats in class, no cellphones, no computers. Didn't treat any of her students with respect, and made an easy class much harder than it needed to be.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Probably wouldnt recommend if you want an easy A for wellness 1000. The online work is very long and takes a good while to complete. This teacher wants very long/ wordy responses and grades very strictly to the rubric. She is very excited about the material covered in this class and will do what she can to pass you.

Great teacher if you enjoy a professor who gives personal stories relating to topic you are currently learning about. In her class, you do not want to take her too seriously because she is very sarcastic, but I myself enjoyed that. You do workout and do other physical activities in this class, but many are fun, we played many interactive games.

Overall, she's a really good teacher. There were some minor issues with the new online class material, but she was not at fault. She is a tough grader, but if your work is long and wordy you get an easy A. copy and pasting  saved my life!

Treats students like they are in middle school. Grades assignments like they are a 3000 level english class. Not helpful at all, rarely emails you back even though she tells you to email her. I would rather sleep on a bed of nails than take her class again. Probably the worst professor at Kennesaw

Since it is a wellness class everything in and out of class is fairly easy to understand on your own. Basically no studying, but tons and tons of busy work and homework. She takes her class very seriously and grades things very strictly even though it's over easy things. She was a middle school teacher and very much so teaches her class that way!
Half of the course is online and what she lectures on in class has no correspondence with what is taught in the online portion

Awful. She changes due dates without notifying you and she is never consistent with grading. Trying to talk to her is like talking to a brick wall, nothing will be resolved. This class was supposed to be an easy A.  I definitely should not have been as worried as I was about my grade in there. Avoid her at all costs.
